title: Intro-Bioengr Stats
description: Introduction to statistical modeling and data analysis in bioscientific and bioengineering applications. Topics include estimation, testing, regression, and experimental design.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 1552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1712 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (CS 1301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1315 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
